segments.text: Hi there . How can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I started a new job last month and I'm expecting my first salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . And your company has a Wage Distribution Service Agreement with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I was told , yes . They gave me this book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's a Current-all-in-one Passbook . That's what you need to get your salary .
segments.speaker: S1
